channel.title: wordpress.com on BarCamp Cork
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress.com on BarCamp Cork

item.title: Automattic is our latest sponsor
item.description: We’re genuinely blown away that Donncha, Toni, Matt and the guys n gals in Automattic are sponsoring BarCamp Cork II. You’ll probably know them better as the people behind Wordpress, Wordpress.com, Wordpress MU and Akismet. This blog and thousands of other Irish ones, run on the software created by these guys and are protected from spam by them too. It all runs like a charm on a Blacknight shared hosting account.
